channel.title: Rule on Greenery's Blog Site
channel.description: Recent content in Rule on Greenery's Blog Site

item.title: Classification
item.description: Article Classification System The classification of articles is managed by two fields: tags and categories. Tags are used for more casual classifications, such as golang and gopher, while categories are used for more formal topic classifications, such as go-dual-token-blog-system. The URLs for the lists of tags and categories are /tags/ and /categories/, respectively. These URLs are set in the navigation bar, making it easy to view all tags and categories.
